episode: I learned that my favorite teacher from high school passed away. I was devastated.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I learned that my favorite teacher from high school passed away. I was devastated.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm so sorry to hear that. Losing someone important is really hard.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She has a long illness. She was, however, still young.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's heartbreaking. It's tough when someone goes too soon.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. It is tough. I hope her family is okay. This was devastating news to hear. I was not expecting it. I heard she was getting better.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's really hard when things happen unexpectedly. I'm here for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you. It was sad to think that her life was cut short and she had so much more to live for.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's truly unfair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It makes me think about the fragility of life.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely. Life can be unpredictable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Life can be much too short.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It really can be.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is important to cherish people while they are here

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Definitely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I tried to convey to her when I last saw her how she was a big part of my life. I hope she took it to heart.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she did.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I can only hope that she was not in a lot of pain

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I hope so too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope she knew that she was beloved

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she did.
